TopicTitle: Help trying to install Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux?

Articles.Content: I've been trying to install Stockalike Station Parts Expansion Redux for at least 4 days now and now I've done everything right I've put the gamedata folder from the mod into the KSP gamedata folder. And when i load up KSP i lose the Mobile Processing Lab & Cupola module and hitchhiker module and docking ports and new parts don't get added in. Am i doing something wrong? if so can you help

If you put the mod's gamedata folder into the game's gamedata folder, take the stuff inside the mod's gamedata folder and place it in the game's gamedata folder.

Have you installed the dependencies?

This is a tutorial on how to install mods.

Copy everything inside the mod's GameData folder and paste it into your KSP GameData folder. Also make sure you have all the dependencies installed- those are mods that are needed by other mods for those other mods to work properly- for SSPXr those are: ModuleManager, B9 Part Switch and Near Future Props, they come bundled with the download but make sure they're the right version for your version of KSP. If you're on KSP 1.9.1 then just use the newest versions of each and you should be fine, 1.8.1 should also be OK but anything 1.7.3 or older will need older versions which you need to track down individually.
